object.name: ahe_ah1z
object.desc: The AH-1Z is the United States Marine Corps. attack helicopter.

object.name: ahe_havoc
object.desc: The Mi-28 is the MEC's attack helicopter.

object.name: ahe_z10
object.desc: The WZ-10 is the attack helicopter for the PLA.

object.name: air_f35b
object.desc: The F-35B is the only VSTOL (Vertical/Short Take-Off and Landing) fighter jet in the game and one of the four Fixed-Wing aircraft (F-35B, F-18, F-15E, A-10) used by the United States Marine Corps. It has no PLA or MEC counterpart and is only found on the USS Essex (LHD-2).

object.name: air_j10
object.desc: The J-10 in Battlefield 2 is the main fighter aircraft of the PLA

object.name: air_su30mkk
object.desc: The Su-30 in Battlefield 2 fullfills the role of a strike fighter for the PLA and as one of the three fixed-wing aircraft operated by the PLA

object.name: chthe_z8
object.desc: the Z-8 is used as the PLA transport helicopter.

object.name: ruair_mig29
object.desc: The MiG-29 is a jet operated by the Middle Eastern Coalition.

object.name: ruair_su34
object.desc: The Su-34 jet is the ground attack fighter for the MEC.

object.name: the_mi17
object.desc: The Mi-17 is the MEC's main transport helicopter.

object.name: usair_f15
object.desc: The F-15E in Battlefield 2 is one of the four fixed-wing aircraft used by the United States Marine Corps

object.name: usair_f18
object.desc: The F/A-18A Hornet appears in Battlefield 2 as one of the four USMC Fixed-wing aircraft in the game

object.name: usthe_uh60
object.desc: The MH-60S Knight Hawk is featured in Battlefield 2 as the USMC's transport helicopter

object.name: aav_tunguska
object.desc: The 2K22 Tunguska is the MEC's anti-aircraft vehicle. It is also the equivalent of the USMC/EU M6 Linebacker and the PLA PGZ-95

object.name: aav_type95
object.desc: The PGZ-95 (referred as the type95 in the game files) is the PLA's anti-aircraft vehicle. It is also the equivalent of the USMC M6 Linebacker and the MEC 2K22 Tunguska.

object.name: apc_btr90
object.desc: The BTR-90 appears in Battlefield 2 as the main Armored Personal Carrier (APC) used by the Middle Eastern Coalition, the Spetsnaz, Rebels, and Insurgents. Its counterparts are the Chinese WZ551 and the American LAV-25.

object.name: apc_wz551
object.desc: the WZ551 is the Armored Personal Carrier (APC) used by the People's Liberation Army. Its counterparts are the USMC LAV-25 and the MEC BTR-90.

object.name: jeep_faav
object.desc: The Desert Patrol Vehicle is one of the 2 light vehicles operated by the United States Marine Corps and the European Union, operating alongside the HMMWV. It's counterpart is the FAV, which is operated by both the PLA and the MEC. Seats three players: a driver, a gunner, and a passenger.

object.name: jep_mec_paratrooper
object.desc: The FAV Buggy is used by the Middle Eastern Coalition, the MEC Special Forces, the People's Liberation Army, the Rebel Forces, the Insurgent Forces and the Spetsnaz. It performs similarly to the USMC Desert Patrol Vehicle and seats three players: a driver, a gunner, and a passenger.

object.name: jep_nanjing
object.desc: The NJ 2046 is the light vehicle of the People's Liberation Army and can hold four players.

object.name: jep_paratrooper
object.desc: The FAV Buggy is used by the Middle Eastern Coalition, the MEC Special Forces, the People's Liberation Army, the Rebel Forces, the Insurgent Forces and the Spetsnaz. It performs similarly to the USMC Desert Patrol Vehicle and seats three players: a driver, a gunner, and a passenger.

object.name: jep_vodnik
object.desc: The Vodnik is the medium transport vehicle of the Middle Eastern Coalition, Spetsnaz and the Russian Rebel Forces.

object.name: rutnk_t90
object.desc: The T-90 is a main battle tank of the Middle Eastern Coalition. It is the counterpart to the USMC M1A2 Abrams, the PLA Type 98, and the EU Leopard 2 and Challenger 2.

object.name: tnk_type98
object.desc: The Type 98 is the People's Liberation Army's main battle tank in Battlefield 2. Its counterparts are the American M1A2 Abrams, European Challenger 2 and Leopard 2, and the MEC T-90.

object.name: usaav_m6
object.desc: The M6 Linebacker in Battlefield 2 is the main air-defense vehicle of the United States Marine Corps and the EU.

object.name: usapc_lav25
object.desc: The LAV-25 is an Armored Personal Carrier (APC) featured in Battlefield 2, operated by the United States Marine Corps.

object.name: usjep_hmmwv
object.desc: The HMMWV is the light armored vehicle featured in Battlefield 2 for of United States Marine Corps and European Union and can hold up to 4 players (1 driver, 1 gunner, 2 passengers).

object.name: ustnk_m1a2
object.desc: The M1A2 is the main battle tank of the United States Marine Corps in Battlefield 2. It is the counterpart to the PLA Type 98, the EU Leopard 2 and Challenger 2, as well as the MEC T-90.

object.name: chat_eryx
object.desc: The ERYX is issued as the default anti-tank weapon for the MEC PLA, MECSF, and Spetsnaz Anti-Tank kits.

object.name: chlmg_type95
object.desc: The Type 95 is the light machine gun issued to the PLA Support Kit.

object.name: chpis_qsz92
object.desc: The QSZ-92 is a pistol weapon, issued to all of the PLA Kits

object.name: chpis_qsz92_silencer
object.desc: The QSZ-92 Silenced, used by the PLA sniper Kit

object.name: chrif_type85
object.desc: The Type 85 is the default PLA Anti-Tank kit submachine gun.

object.name: chrif_type95
object.desc: The QBZ-97 is the standard primary weapon of the PLA Special Forces kit

object.name: chsht_norinco982
object.desc: The NOR982 is a 12-gauge, pump-action combat shotgun, issued to the PLA Engineer kit.

object.name: chsht_protecta
object.desc: The DAO-12 is the Tier One unlock for the Anti-Tank Kit

object.name: chsni_type88
object.desc: The Type 88 is a standard Sniper Rifle for the PLA.

object.name: nshgr_flashbang
object.desc: The Flashbang is a gadget featured in the Battlefield 2: Special Forces expansion for the Assault kit.

object.name: rulmg_pkm
object.desc: The PKM is a Tier One unlock in Battlefield 2 for the Support kit.

object.name: rulmg_rpk74
object.desc: The RPK-74 is a weapon for the MEC's Support Kit.

object.name: rupis_baghira
object.desc: The MR-444 is a weapon issued as the standard sidearm of the Middle Eastern Coalition, Spetsnaz, MECSF, Rebels, and Insurgents

object.name: rupis_baghira_silencer
object.desc: The MR-444 Silenced is a weapon issued to the Sniper kit for the Middle Eastern Coalition, Spetsnaz, MECSF, Rebels, and Insurgents

object.name: rurgl_gp25
object.desc: The GP-25 is a weapon that is attached to the AK-47, issued uniquely to the PLA Assault kit.

object.name: rurgl_gp30
object.desc: The GP-30 is a weapon that is attached to the AK-101 assault rifle used by the MEC.

object.name: rurif_ak101
object.desc: The AK-101 is a weapon issued to the MEC as their service rifle for both the Assault and Medic kits

object.name: rurif_ak47
object.desc: The AK-47 is the standard primary weapon for the PLA's Assault and Medic kits.

object.name: rurif_bizon
object.desc: the PP-19 "Bizon" is issued to the MEC Anti-Tank Kit.

object.name: rurif_dragunov
object.desc: The SVD is a weapon featured in Battlefield 2 for the MEC Sniper kit.

object.name: rurrif_ak74u
object.desc: The AK-74U is the standard primary weapon for the Special Forces on the MEC team

object.name: rusht_saiga12
object.desc: The S12K is the default weapon for the Engineer kit for the MEC team

object.name: usatp_predator
object.desc: The SRAW (also known as the Predator SRAW) is issued to the USMC, SEALs, SAS, and EU Anti-Tank kit.

object.name: ushgr_m67
object.desc: Hand grenades are standard issue to each playable faction.

object.name: uslmg_m249saw
object.desc: The M249 SAW is the first weapon unlocked in the Support kit for the United States Marine Corps

object.name: uspis_92fs
object.desc: The 92FS is the USMC's and European Union's standard sidearm

object.name: uspis_92fs_silencer
object.desc: The 92FS Silenced is issued to the USMC sniper kit

object.name: usrgl_m203
object.desc: The M203 is a weapon Grenade Launcher attachment for the M16A2.

object.name: usrif_g36c
object.desc: The G36C is the Tier One unlock for the Special Forces kit

object.name: usrif_G3a3
object.desc: The G3 is the Tier 1 unlock for the Assault Kit

object.name: usrif_m16a2
object.desc: The M16A2 is the standard assault rifle used by the USMC Assualt and Medic kits

object.name: usrif_m24
object.desc: The M24 is the default sniper rifle for the USMC

object.name: usrif_m4
object.desc: The M4 is the standard primary weapon for the USMC's Special Forces kit.

object.name: usrif_mp5_a3
object.desc: The MP5 is the default submachine gun of the USMC Anti-tank kit

object.name: usrif_remington11-87
object.desc: The M11-87 is a weapon issued to the USMC Engineer Kit

object.name: usrif_sa80
object.desc: The L85A1 unlock weapon

object.name: ussht_jackhammer
object.desc: The MK3A1 is the Tier one unlock for the Engineer Kit.

object.name: ussni_m95_barret
object.desc: The M95 is a Tier One unlock for the Sniper kit.

object.name: ats_tow
object.desc: The BGM-71 TOW is the stationary anti-tank launcher used by the USMC, US Navy SEALs, as well as the EU in Euro Force. Its counterpart is the Chinese HJ-8.

object.name: ats_hj8
object.desc: The HJ-8 is the stationary anti-tank launcher used by the People's Liberation Army and the Middle Eastern Coalition. Its counterpart is the USMC TOW.

object.name: igla_djigit
object.desc: The Igla stationary anti-aircraft site used by the People's Liberation Army and Middle Eastern Coalition, with two missiles that lock on and track enemy aircraft.

object.name: usaas_stinger
object.desc: The Stinger stationary anti-aircraft site used by the USMC and European Union, with two missiles that lock on and track enemy aircraft.
